title: Layer One X
author: Layer One X
created_time: February 01, 2023, 04:38:41 AMLast edit: February 06, 2023, 11:58:24 AM by Layer One X
content: Welcome to a Connected future  There have been a few evolutions of the blockchain.  First Bitcoin, then Ethereum introduced the idea of using smart contracts on the blockchain, which opened up new possibilities for businesses and developers. This marked a significant advancement in technology and that was a great start.  Blockchains have revolutionized the way we think about security and scalability, but to date each blockchain has been running a race to advocate for their technology only.  It's time to take things to the next level. The ability to seamlessly communicate between multiple blockchains with true decentralized interoperability is crucial for unlocking the full potential of blockchain technology to unleash mass adoption.    That’s where Layer One X comes in. Layer One X (L1X) is a new layer one platform that focuses on Decentralization, Interoperability, Security and Scalability without compromising any of them.     What is Layer One X?  L1X allows blockchains to communicate with each other through decentralized consensus, truly taking the tenet of decentralization to the people. Currently, L1X supports multiple blockchains including Solana and EVM-compatible chains like Ethereum, Binance, AVAX, MATIC, Fantom, Arbitrum, Optimism with more chains continually added as development progresses.    Unlike other platforms, we eliminate the need for centralized parties and bridges to facilitate communication between blockchains.  We are not competing with current layer one chains, but are working in collaboration with them, finally allowing true decentralized interoperability.    Layer One X introduces a game-changing hybrid consensus mechanism that rewards users and makes dApp development simpler and more efficient.    Mass adoption of decentralized technology requires more than just blockchain interoperability. Layer One X offers developers and projects the ability to build and scale their applications on a secure and scalable platform, unlocking access to a multichain world. Our platform is designed to not only support its own applications but also to be leveraged by other web3 projects, leading to a more streamlined and interconnected web3 ecosystem.  The goal is 100,000 TPS with under 500ms block creation and Layer One X aims to put the world's 8.6 billion smart devices to work for micro-validation, fast confirmation, higher throughput and mass adoption.   Join us as a developer, investor or evangelist to help us create the next evolution of the blockchain - a decentralized, interoperable, scalable and secure multi-chain world.
